thread.title: China's 'Jack the Ripper' handed death sentence

title: China's 'Jack the Ripper' handed death sentence
text:
China's 'Jack the Ripper' handed death sentence 9:00am EDT - 00:55 
A Chinese court sentenced a 54-year-old man dubbed the country's ''Jack the Ripper'' to death on Friday (March 30) for the rape and murder of 11 women and girls over the course of 14 years, state television reported. Sarah Charlton reports.   
A Chinese court sentenced a 54-year-old man dubbed the country's "Jack the Ripper" to death on Friday (March 30) for the rape and murder of 11 women and girls over the course of 14 years, state television reported. Sarah Charlton reports.  //reut.rs/2J6dRQZ
